heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Penn A + Chicago B | 11 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This technique is often combined with gas chromatography in order to separate the constituent species of a sample before subjecting them to further analysis. For 10 points each: [10] Name this technique in which the identity of a chemical species is determined by fragmenting it and measuring the mass-to-charge ratio of the fragments.
